Description: Used of course. I don't play but the guitar works. You can see a few dings pictured. Looks like normal wear to me. It will ship in some kind of gig bag.The translucent finish over a flamed maple top is the first hint at the depth of the LTD H-500 electric guitar from ESP. A 3-piece maple neck attached with the tone-maximizing set-thru joint combined with string-thru body construction give this guitar great sustain and strength. The thin U-shaped neck with 24 extra-jumbo frets provides comfort for all playing styles. Abalone dot inlays in the rosewood fretboard and black nickel hardware complement the rest of the guitar's look perfectly. A Seymour Duncan humbucker pickup at the bridge and a 59 at the neck provide plenty of power. Grover tuners and an Earvana compensated nut ensure you'll sound spot on in tune in every key.FEATURESConstruction/Scale: Set-thru / 25-1/2"Body: Mahogany with flamed maple topNeck/Fingerboard: 3-piece maple/rosewoodNut Type/Width: Earvana compensated/ 42mmNeck Shape: Thin UInlays: Abalone dotsFrets: 24 extra-jumboBinding: White (B/N/H)Hardware: Black nickelTuners: GroverBridge/Tailpiece: Tune-o-matic style w/ String-thru bodyPickups: Seymour Duncan JB (B) / 59 (N) ActiveElectronics: Vol / Tone / 3-way switch
Title: ESP LTD H-500 Electric Guitar with Duncan Pickups
